title: very good experience

Had an issue initially (side effect) took a few days for doctor to respond but overall satisfied. After 10 weeks, not seeing the results i wanted. Will hold RX for the time (still finishing the last month RX products) but hope to return soon after I consult family physician

If you decide to return, weâ€™ll be here to assist you in any way we can.Thank you again for choosing Winona. We're always striving to improve, and your feedback on the website navigation is valuable to us. title: Winona!! Thank you
paragraph: Saw Winona on Facebook and was willing to try anything after years of debilitating hip and back pain. I tried everything else and was even considering stem cells when I came across Winona.  I filled out the form and was contacted within a day. The doctor asked me a few more questions and then prescribed estrogen and DHEA. I had my products the next week and I swear within 3 weeks my hip and back pain were gone. I didn't want to tell anyone with fear it may come back at any time. It's been 3 week and still gone. Dr Peter checked back in with me at 10 weeks asking how everything was going and said he would check back at 1 year again but to please reach out if any concerns or changes. Love this product and that someone was willing to listen to my concerns and not dismiss that they couldn't find anything wrong. It changed my quality of life. Thank you

That has calmed down and I do still feel brain fog and exhaustion. I am waiting to hear back from the doc, but hoping for an increase in strength to see if I can capture that first week feeling for longer. I have not had any of the negative effects. I haven't loss any hair nor gained any weight. I am excited for the future, now. Just try it. You may be pleasantly surprised.
reply_paragraph: We are just as excited for your future too, Brantlee!Getting our bioidentical HRT through an online platform can be unsettling and a little scary at first to some women, but we are here to support you every step of the way.Our treatments are safe, economical, and most importantly, effective!They can also be adjusted to fit your particular symptoms, so we are hopeful that you will find even more benefits as you work with your Winona doctor to fine tune your treatment plan. title: Trust the Process
paragraph: I feel like menopause hit me over night. One minute I was at the top of my athletic career , the next minute I have all these weird injuries, I have no endurance and I standing in the mirror, asking myself "where did all this body fat come from?" I was having at least 10-15 hot flashes a day and night sweats were 1.5- 2 hrs apart, my sleep was horrible , so after about 4 hrs of interrupted sleep, why bother anymore, I would just get up and start another long day . Then after some research and having that talk with myself - I decided to give Winona a try.  I joined the face book group and read postings everyday, It helped me stay the course when I felt like it wasn't working at times.  So my advise is stay the course, they suggest give it 8-10 weeks. Be patient, this is a whole new you. I am at 10 weeks and I am sleeping so hard. I wake up so refreshed. My night sweats havens been around for about 4 weeks now, I only get a hot flash from time to time but I have found some food triggers them . My evil now is chocolate, hot sauce and fried foods. The DHEA makes me feel like the energizer bunny when I take it mid morning. I'm still trying to adjust my macros/ meals and timings to see what works best for me now as the DHEA suppresses my appetite- Cream at night before bed.  My weight training is going well- lifting heavier. I love cardio so that's getting better again. I did gain 8lbs it seemed like over night - working on that both mentally and physically.  I do feel there is a light at the end of the tunnel and I will get back to my ole self with the help of Winona products.
reply_paragraph: Thanks for sharing your experience, Morgan!As you discovered, even when you eat all the right things and work out consistently, menopause symptoms can still throw you for a loop!What worked before does not help at all, and it can feel like your body is betraying you!We love that you are finding a whole new you and that you are listening to your body's cues about what it does and does not like. Starting HRT can definitely give your body the hormone balance that it is craving, but we must still do our part to work with it, and you are doing fantastic! We applaud your self-awareness and commitment to yourself!

title: WHEN will it start working?

paragraph: Medication was not effective. The service was fast and responsive, but I did not experience any improvements after 10 weeks of treatment. I think Winona's emphasis on weight loss in the advertising is disingenuous.

We know it is hard to be patient.We ask you to complete the 10 week Follow Up for the is reason, as the doctor can discuss a dosage change at that time. Most women see some improvement within the first few weeks, but other things like weight loss, can take extended time.  While HRT can be helpful, it's important to note that there is no magic pill, and you will still need to make lifestyle changes such as diet and exercise to achieve your desired results. However, many patients have had success in losing weight while taking HRT!A member of our Patient Care Team has emailed you for further support!

title: Progress is hopeful, and I feel cared for.
paragraph: I am currently 10 weeks in use of this product and all though I have not seen the results I had hoped for, the Doctor and patient care representatives have been amazing in discussing my progress and how to possibly adjust dosage to see and feel the needed results moving forward.  The attention to the customer and their needs is amazing and I hope the next time I rate my experience it will be a full 5 stars!  A special thanks to Dr. Green and Tonya Fike for going above and beyond in my care.
reply_paragraph: We are sorry that you do not feel better yet, Laura!HRT works best if taken consistently every day over time, so that is why we send your refills to you automatically.  The refills are timed to arrive before your existing supply of medication runs out.  We never want you to be without your medication so you can get the best results!It can also take around 3 months to see the changes you are looking for as your body adjusts to the influx of hormones.   We know it is hard to be patient!A member of our Patient Care team has emailed you for further support ;)

title: Life changing!
paragraph: I am currently 47 and started menopause early at the age of 39. In the last 3 years I have struggled with constant and severe hot flashes to the point it would take my breath away, night sweats that would have me changing pjs sometimes twice, weird body odor I had never had before, vaginal dryness, loss of libido, and pretty major mood swings. I started HRT 10 weeks ago and every one of these symptoms have improved dramatically! Iâ€™m sleeping better, I donâ€™t feel like a crazy person in a constant fog, and seldom have a hot flash now, but best of all my husband and I have a renewed sex life! I am now off all other meds for depression and anxiety and finally feel like myself again! My only regret is not starting sooner! I know HRT isnâ€™t for everyone, but it has been life changing for me! Talk to Dr Green and ask all the questions! He responds fairly quickly, is extremely knowledgeable, and will help you find what works best for you! And I love having it delivered right to my door!

title: I felt listened to for the first timeâ€¦
paragraph: I felt listened to for the first time in years by my By Winona doctor.  Iâ€™m slowly getting back to feeling like myselfâ€¦10 weeks and my hot flashes are 90% better and I donâ€™t get them at all in the night.  Iâ€™m so glad I did this.

title: 10 weeks in and feeling so much better
paragraph: 10 weeks in and feeling so much better! No more hot flashes.  Definitely feeling more energetic and alive.

title: Worth trying!
paragraph: I have been using Winona for 10 weeks now. I have had a significant decrease in hot flashes since starting. Would definitely recommend to anyone who is perimenopausal and looking for relief.

title: Like most women I was nervous and yetâ€¦
paragraph: Like most women I was nervous and yet wanted to find a healthy solution for my body. Winona has been a very real and easy solution. The delivery of products and the communication and support from the Facebook community has made my first 10 weeks a positive experience.

title: It's been a long road, but finally some relief
paragraph: Winona has truly been amazing.  I started perimenopausal symptoms at 45. Weight gain, mood swings, depression, and really not feeling like myself.  I talked to my doctor and searched the internet trying to find relief. I just didn't believe what everyone was telling me that I should just live with how I was feeling, that it was just going to get worse and heard over and over again "It's how everyone goes through menopause".Then I found Winona.  These products work. As soon as I started applying the cream, it was instant relief of the night sweats and I found I could sleep again through the night. In a few weeks, I started seeing my mood shift and just recently I feel the bloating and weight gain finally starting to subside.  I've been on the products for a little over 10 weeks and I am so happy I found them.  They are truly a lifesaver for me. I am feeling more and more like my old self and so many people notice the shift in my mood. I don't feel bloated or have the blahs anymore. I feel like me before menopause and I'm starting to see so much more energy.  If you're on the fence, I say give it a try.  I was very skeptical but went for it. I am so glad I did.

title: Saved me from hot flashes and night sweats!
paragraph: When my periord started to become less regular I started to notice I was getting hot flashes and night sweats due to my decreased estrogen and progesterone levels. I found Winona on FB or Instagram and did the test. They sent me the 50/50 Est/Prog cream and DHEA pills. I started noticing decreased hot flashes and night sweats within the first month. I have been taking both daily now for 10 weeks and no hot flashes or night sweats. These have been the only symptons of pre-menopause for me and I hope that continues. So far so good! I even recommended to my girlfriend, so we'll see how things go for her too. I highly recomment Winona. Wish it was covered under insurance though...

title: Winona has changed my life
paragraph: Winona has changed my life, my outlook, and my level of happiness overall!  Ten weeks into the treatment regimen has exceeded my expectations.  My emotions are on a more even keel, I am sleeping better than I have since my 20s, and I just feel great! I love the ease of interaction with my doctor and I feel confident in reaching out to her.

title: Skeptic turned believer
paragraph: I was skeptical at first, but it was an easy process to get and worth a shot since nothing else worked.  The first dose (2 pumps of cream and 1 DHEA for first 10 weeks) definitely helped with my sleep, mood, energy, and libido. The only con was a little more acne, but nothing I couldn't control. But the second dose (increased cream and same DHEA) wow. That is when inflammation finally seemed to go down and I started feeling some weight loss relief.

title: Did This Thing Online
paragraph: 10 weeks or so ago, I was at the end of my patience with my body. I felt like I was trapped in a strangerâ€™s body. Poor sleep, dry skin, joints that hurt all the time, packed on 20+ pounds in less than a year  and NO sex drive. The worst was the sex drive. It hurt my heart because my husband and I had always shared this beautiful, intimate physical love that mirrored our feelings for each other. Conceptually, I wanted sex, but it was just too much effort  suddenly. I also had began to hate my body, the body that had weathered so much and given life to 3 children. The one I should have been proud of. I had doctorsâ€™ say, â€œYep, menopause sucks,â€ and â€œdeal with it.â€ There seemed to be no hope.So I took a risk. Did this thing online. Took a quiz. Corresponded with a doctor and got some meds from Winona. The process was easy. The service was great. I feel that I am in control now and have choices.I have more energy, I feel better. I am starting to recognize this 56 year old body again. It will be a long journey back to my desired shape. Iâ€™d say sleep has improved, but the newly found desire for intimacy is keeping us both up for hours at night! Guess I need to learn how to take naps!

title: Work in progress!
paragraph: I've really enjoyed the experience with Winona. The communication has been very good and any questions I had were answered right away. I can tell a difference with some symptoms but I do still have slight mood swings and occasional night sweats. After my first 10 weeks, the Dr contacted me and adjusted my prescription with the hormone lotion and I am excited to continue my path to feeling normal again!

paragraph: Very user friendly questionnaire enables the doctor to work to address your specific symptoms. Medication is delivered rapidly. There is a follow up to make sure the prescription is helping and there are no side effects. Support is available  thereafter. A follow up with the doctor occurs 10 weeks after. Prescription is automatically refilled. Very easy and stress free. I feel so much relief from my symptoms. No need to keep suffering theu this when help is available

title: Winona has been life changing
paragraph: Winona has been life changing. I have been on it for 10 weeks now and I am delighted. In the first 3 weeks my hot flashes have gone from 10+ a night to my sleeping through the night. Waking up refreshed really puts your day right. My meno belly is finally going down now and I feel so much better in my clothes. I like that you have a real OBGYN Looking after you. If this is not safe for your medical history the Dr will not prescribe it. Give it a try. If youâ€™re like me youâ€™ve tried everything else.

title: I have diligently been using the HRTâ€¦
paragraph: I have diligently been using the HRT cream from Winona each night for around 10 weeks as well as the DHEA supplement each morning. I have without a doubt experienced more sustained energy throughout the day and feel that my recovery time from intense workouts has shortened. I am a work hard-play hard woman and prior to taking Winona felt extremely tired by 4:00 or 5:00pm, I now keep going easily until 9:00pm. I look forward to continued use and seeing even more results with my overall health and well-being.

title: Hello
paragraph: Hello! I just wanted to hop on and give my experience taking the oral estrogen and DHEA and the awesome Dr Davis! I was hesitant to start this program since I am post menopausal since age 30 (Iâ€™m 59 now), thinking it probably wouldnâ€™t help with my symptoms (night sweats, hair loss, low libido, etc) but I have to say, after being on the meds for almost 10 weeks now, I do feel better, my sleep has improved, and even my libido is a little better. Yay! Dr Davis has been very quick to respond to any questions and I feel comfortable with him following my care ( and Iâ€™m a retired nurse, so I know how some docs can be). Anyway, I would encourage anyone to try the programâ€¦ itâ€™s working for me!

title: Game changer!!
paragraph: To date, my experience with Winona has been amazing. It begins with a health assessment that is sent to an MD upon completion. Within 24 hours, a doctor was assigned to my case and he sent me a message introducing himself along with his recommendations to treat my symptoms. About 10 days later I received my new prescription in the mail and less than two weeks later there was a noticeable improvement. Here I am 10 weeks later and the the symptoms are so mild that I barely notice them. I just had my follow up and all is well. If you're on the fence, fill out the questionnaire. Run, don't walk...the folks at Winona are ready to help!!

paragraph: I started using Winona cream BHRT ten weeks ago and am so glad I did.  The convenience, privacy and ease of using Winonaâ€™s services are amazing. The difference Iâ€™ve experienced since starting with Winonaâ€”no more hot flashes, better mood, increased energyâ€¦and starting to be easier to drop some lbs. Iâ€™ve got absolutely no regrets about my choice to try Winona.

title: Winona really works!!
paragraph: Winona has been amazing so far. I saw it on instagram and thought I would give it a try to help with weight loss and to help with my occasional moodiness. lol I am feeling better and dropping a few pounds! Not peri or menopausal yet but may be in a couple years so I am checking this out. Just 10 weeks in so we will see if things continue to be great. Love Dr. Green and all the customer service people! title: HRT CHANGED MY LIFE:  I am 54 years old and have been goingâ€¦
paragraph: I am 54 years old and have been going through menopausal symptoms for years. I tried everything from natural based capsules to Prescription medication.  I knew my body was changing and my moods were even being effected.  I started to research HRT and came across By Winona. I was skeptical due to not really knowing anything about HRT.  I talked to Dr Green and asked lots of questions, he was very quick to respond back in explaining how HRT works.  I started on the medication he prescribed, after about 4 weeks I started noticing changes in how I was feeling and even loosing a few pounds which I have not been able to do in 5 years. I felt like I was stuck on the same weight no matter what I did. My hot flashes definitely started to resolve. My sleeping patterns changed for the better. I am now at 10 weeks and feel like a new woman.  My boyfriend even noticed changes in my body.  My moods are so much better.  I can not say enough about By Winona.  Thank you Dr Green and all your staff. Stacey Reneâ€™
